summary: 调用ActivateRouterInterface接口激活处于Inactive状态的路由器接口。

schema.description:
路由器接口所在的地域ID。

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~36063~~)接口获取地域ID。

400.errorMessage: RouterInterface can be operated by this action only when it's status is Inactive.
This RouterInterface is financiel locked because of bills outstanding.
The operation is failed because of PconnTrafficNotEnable.
The router does not belong to your account.
This RouterInterface is not a vlan interface for connection.
The opposite router interface is already deleted.

404.errorMessage: The specified RegionId does not exist in our records.
The specified RouterInterfaceId does not exist in our records.

title: 激活路由器接口
description:
调用ActivateRouterInterface接口后，路由器接口进入**Activating**状态，激活成功后进入**Active**状态。 

> 无法激活处于欠费状态的路由器接口。
